summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1572, for the improvement of West 60th Street in the City of Seattle, from 8th Avenue Northwest to 14th Avenue Northwest, by grading and curbing the same, under Ordinance No. 16795 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
